mapper.select: SELECT cc.comName, cs.spotNo, cs.companyNo, cs.spName, cs.spAddr, cs.spAgreementDate, cs.spStatus, cs.spChangeDate, cu.userName FROM RAIN_cCompany_tbl cc INNER JOIN RAIN_cSpot_tbl cs ON cc.companyNo = cs.companyNo INNER JOIN RAIN_cUser_tbl cu ON cs.spotNo = cu.spotNo

SELECT cc.comName, cs.spName, cs.spAddr, cu.userName FROM RAIN_cCompany_tbl cc INNER JOIN RAIN_cSpot_tbl cs ON cc.companyNo = cs.companyNo INNER JOIN RAIN_cUser_tbl cu ON cs.spotNo = cu.spotNo WHERE cc.comName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cs.spName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cs.spAddr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cu.userName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY cc.companyNo ASC
SELECT s.*, c.comName FROM RAIN_cSpot_tbl s INNER JOIN RAIN_cCompany_tbl c ON s.companyNo = c.companyNo WHERE s.spotNo = #{spotNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RAIN_cSpot_tbl (companyNo, spName, spAddr, spDetailAddr, spAgreementFile, spContact, spAgreementDate, spAgreementTerm, spAutoExtension, spPayMethod, spEmpNum, spBdgt, spStatus) VALUES (#{companyNo}, #{spName}, #{spAddr}, #{spDetailAddr}, #{filePath}, #{spContact}, #{spAgreementDate}, #{spAgreementTerm}, #{spAutoExtension}, #{spPayMethod}, #{spEmpNum}, #{spBdgt}, '활동')
INSERT INTO RAIN_cUser_tbl (spotNo, companyNo, userName, userEmail, userContact, userPw) VALUES (#{spotNo}, #{vo.companyNo}, #{vo.userName}, #{vo.userEmail}, #{vo.userContact}, #{vo.userPw})
mapper.update: UPDATE RAIN_cUser_tbl SET companyNo = #{vo.companyNo}, userName = #{vo.userName}, userEmail = #{vo.userEmail}, userContact = #{vo.userContact} WHERE spotNo = #{spotNo}
UPDATE RAIN_cUser_tbl SET userName = #{userName}, userEmail = #{userEmail}, userContact = #{userContact}, userPw = #{userPw} WHERE spotNo = #{spotNo}
mapper.select: SELECT e.cEmpNo, e.cEmpName, e.cEmpTel, e.cEmpEmail, e.cEmpPosition, e.cEmpBirth, s.spBdgt, o.orderDate, p.prdName FROM RAIN_cEMP_tbl e INNER JOIN RAIN_cSpot_tbl s ON e.spotNo = s.spotNo INNER JOIN RAIN_order_tbl o ON e.cEmpNo = o.cEmpNo INNER JOIN RAIN_Products_tbl p ON o.prdNo = p.prdNo WHERE e.spotNo = #{spotNo}
